S04n465:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavato'ntikādidamevaṃrūpamupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitanirdeśaṃ śrutvā eṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca bhagavato vṛṣabhatāṃ śrutvā āścaryaprāpto'bhūdadbhutaprāpto'bhūnnirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena prītiprāmodyena sphuṭo'bhūt |
S04n465:2: mahatā ca prītiprāmodyena mahatā ca dharmagauraveṇa utthāyāsanād bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ cittamutpāditavān-āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S04n465:9: tathāgata evāsmākaṃ jānīte āśayaṃ pūrvayogacaryāṃ ca |
S04n465:10: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthito'bhūd bhagavantameva namaskurvan animiṣābhyāṃ ca netrābhyāṃ saṃprekṣamāṇaḥ ||
S04n465:11: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ pūrṇasya maitrāyaṇīputrasya cittāśayamavalokya sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyamimaṃ śrāvakaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputraṃ yo mayāsya bhikṣusaṃghasya dharmakathikānāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S04n465:14: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako'klānto dharmadeśanayā,
S04n465:17: muktvā bhikṣavastathāgataṃ nānyaḥ śaktaḥ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputramarthato vā vyañjanato vā paryādātum |
S04n465:18: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo mamaivāyaṃ saddharmaparigrāhaka iti?
S04n465:22: yatra anenaiva teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane saddharmaḥ parigṛhītaḥ |
S04n465:23: tadyathāpi nāma mama etarhi sarvatra cāgryo dharmakathikānāmabhūt,
S04n465:28: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane yāvadāyuṣpramāṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caritavān |
S04n465:29: sarvatra ca śrāvaka iti saṃjñāyate sma |
S04n465:35: eṣāmapi bhikṣavo vipaśyipramukhānāṃ saptānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yeṣāmahaṃ saptamaḥ,
S04n465:37: yadapi tadbhikṣavo bhaviṣyatyanāgate'dhvani asmin bhadrakalpe caturbhirbuddhairūnaṃ buddhasahasram,
S04n465:38: teṣāmapi śāsane eṣa eva pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro'gryo dharmakathikānāṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04n465:44: sa imāmevaṃrūpāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya aprameyairasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate |
S04n465:45: dharmaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n465:47: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātava ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n465:48: samaṃ pāṇitalajātaṃ saptaratnamayamapagataparvataṃ saptaratnamayaiḥ kūṭāgāraiḥ paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n465:52: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena idaṃ buddhakṣetramapagatapāpaṃ bhaviṣyati apagatamātṛgrāmaṃ ca |
S04n465:53: sarve ca te sattvā aupapādukā bhaviṣyanti brahmacāriṇo manomayairātmabhāvaiḥ svayaṃprabhā ṛddhimanto vaihāyasaṃgamā vīryavantaḥ smṛtimantaḥ prajñāvantaḥ suvarṇavarṇaiḥ samucchrayairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtavigrahāḥ |
S04n465:54: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dvāvāhārau bhaviṣyataḥ |
S04n465:57: aprameyāṇi cāsaṃkhyeyāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti sarveṣāṃ ca mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ pratisaṃvidgatiṃgatānāṃ sattvāvavādakuśalānām |
S04n465:58: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāścāsya śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti maharddhikā mahānubhāvā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ |
S04n465:63: parinirvṛtasya ca tasya bhagavato dharmaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saddharmaścirasthāyī bhaviṣyati |
S04n465:64: ratnamayaiśca stūpaiḥ sā lokadhātuḥ sphuṭā bhaviṣyati |
S04n465:78: evaṃ ca bhāṣanti vayaṃ hi śrāvakā
S04n465:148: atha khalu teṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ vaśībhūtaśatānāmetadabhavat-āścaryaprāpta sma,
S04n465:152: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma-imāni kāśyapa dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni,
S04n465:155: tatra kāśyapa kauṇḍinyo bhikṣurmahāśrāvako dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ samantaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
S04n465:156: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n465:157: tatra kāśyapa anenaikena nāmadheyena pañca tathāgataśatāni bhaviṣyanti |
S04n465:160: tadyathā gayākāśyapo nadīkāśyapaḥ urubilvakāśyapaḥ kālaḥ kālodāyī aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo bakkulaścundaḥ svāgataḥ ityevaṃpramukhāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatāni ||
S04n465:161: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n465:214: atha khalu tāni pañcārhacchatāni bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamātmano vyākaraṇāni śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasa pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n465:215: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirobhirnipatya evamāhuḥ-atyayaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan deśayāmo yairasmābhirbhagavannevaṃ satatasamitaṃ cittaṃ paribhāvitam-idamasmākaṃ parinirvāṇam |
S04n465:219: yairnāma asmābhirbhagavaṃstathāgatajñāne'bhisaṃboddhavye evaṃrūpeṇa parīttena jñānena paritoṣaṃ gatāḥ sma |
S04n465:220: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kasyacideva puruṣasya kaṃcideva mitragṛhaṃ praviṣṭasya mattasya vā suptasya vā sa mitro'narghamaṇiratnaṃ vastrānte badhnīyāt-asyedaṃ maṇiratnaṃ bhavatviti |
S04n465:221: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣa utthāyāsanāt prakāmet |
S04n465:225: mahatā ca vyāyāmena kathaṃcit kaṃcidāhāraṃ pratilabheta |
S04n465:227: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya sa purāṇamitraḥ puruṣo yena tasya tadanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte baddham,
S04n465:229: tamevaṃ vadet-kiṃ tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṛcchramāpadyase āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ,
S04n465:230: yadā yāvad bhoḥ puruṣa mayā tava sukhavihārārthaṃ sarvakāmanivartakamanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte upanibaddham |
S04n465:233: na ca nāma tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa pratyavekṣase-kiṃ mama baddhaṃ yena vā baddhaṃ ko hetuḥ kiṃnidānaṃ vā baddhametat?
S04n465:234: bālajātīyastvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yastvaṃ kṛcchreṇa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇastuṣṭimāpadyase |
S04n465:235: gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa etanmaṇiratnaṃ grahāya mahānagaraṃ gatvā parivartayastva |
S04n465:236: tena ca dhanena sarvāṇi dhanakaraṇīyāni kuruṣveti ||
S04n465:237: evameva bhagavan asmākamapi tathāgatena pūrvameva bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvajñatācittānyutpāditānyabhūvan |
S04n465:238: tāni ca vayaṃ bhagavan na jānīmo na budhyāmahe |
S04n465:239: te vayaṃ bhagavan arhadbhūmau nirvṛtāḥ sma iti saṃjānīmaḥ |
S04n465:241: yadvayaṃ bhagavan evaṃ parīttena jñānena paritoṣamāpadyāmaḥ |
S04n465:243: te vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena saṃbodhyamānāḥ-mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava etannirvāṇaṃ manyadhvam |
S04n465:244: saṃvidyante bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ saṃtāne kuśalamūlāni yāni mayā pūrvaṃ paripācitāni |
S04n465:245: etarhi ca mamaivedamupāyakauśalyaṃ dharmadeśanābhilāpena yad yūyametarhi nirvāṇamiti manyadhve |
S04n465:246: evaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavatā saṃbodhayitvā adyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ ||
S04n465:247: atha khalu tāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatānyājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhāni tasyāṃ velāyamimā gāthā abhāṣanta—
S04n465:270: taṃ cāpi ratnaṃ hi bhaveta vismṛtaṃ
